This project was mainly funded by the **Wellcome Trust** via a Senior Research Fellowship to Sebastian Funk (210758/Z/18/Z)

Previously, the project was enabled through access to the **MRC eMedLab Medical Bioinformatics infrastructure**, supported by the **Medical Research Council** (MR/L016311/1)
